meanings.definition: Involving or occurring between different genera.
meanings.sent1: The intergeneric study compared plants from various genera.
meanings.sent2: Scientists conducted an intergeneric analysis to understand the differences between species.
meanings.sent3: The intergeneric garden was a mix of flowers from different plant families.
meanings.sent4: Her intergeneric approach to gardening blended diverse types of plants seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The intergeneric experiment showcased the unique characteristics of each genus.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the relationship between different genera.
meanings.sent1: The intergeneric hybrid plant displayed traits from multiple genera.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the intergeneric connections between various plant families.
meanings.sent3: The intergeneric friendship between the two animals was unexpected but heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The intergeneric bond between the different bird species was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent5: The intergeneric collaboration among the different plant types led to a beautiful ecosystem.
